title: Halloumi and greens salad
ingredients: ['2 handfuls salad leaves', '1/2 tomato, cut into wedges', 'fresh herbs, of your choice (e.g. coriander)', '1/2 avocado, stoned and chopped', '1 to 2 tablespoons salad dressing, of your choice', '1 to 2 teaspoons olive oil', '3 to 4 slices halloumi cheese']
